page.title: 10Things to do in our block(2)
page.content: There are lots of places for adults- two pubs, with darts,pool and snooker tables.There is a concert hall where they have shows and play Bingo. When I'm older I will be able to go to the Secondary school youth club. Things to do in Pantscallog village. My name is Joanna and I live in Pant. There are lots of things for adults to do.There is a golf course nearby,three pubs,a workingmen's club where darts, snooker and bingo is played.There is a concert and dance hall and a women's guild. For the children there are cub,brownie and guide troops,three playgrounds and a football pitch.But if we want to go to a library or go rollerskating then we have to go to Merthyr.This is quite expensive by bus.But I like living in Pant because there is nice countryside where we can play.
